summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OhCampus Admin College Management features (iteration 4). All backend tests passed (25/25). All frontend features working correctly including search bar, filters (State/City/Category/Course), tabs (All/By Location/By Category/By Course), Manage Courses dialog with seat status dropdown, and counselor view seat status badges.
passed_tests: Backend: Authentication - Admin and Counselor login (2 tests)
Backend: GET /api/courses returns courses with seat_status field (3 tests)
Backend: PUT /api/courses/{id}/seat-status - all 4 status values work (4 tests)
Backend: PUT /api/courses/{id}/seat-status - validation and auth (3 tests)
Backend: GET /api/filters returns states, cities, categories, courses (4 tests)
Backend: GET /api/colleges with search and filter params (7 tests)
Backend: GET /api/colleges/{id}/fee-summary includes seat_status (1 test)
Backend: POST /api/courses defaults seat_status to 'Available' (1 test)
Frontend: Admin sidebar includes 'College Management' link
Frontend: College Management page loads with title and description
Frontend: Search bar filters colleges by name (data-testid='college-search')
Frontend: State filter dropdown (data-testid='state-filter')
Frontend: City filter dropdown (data-testid='city-filter')
Frontend: Category filter dropdown (data-testid='category-filter')
Frontend: Course filter dropdown (data-testid='course-filter')
Frontend: 'All Colleges' tab shows all 8 colleges
Frontend: 'By Location' tab groups colleges by state (Karnataka: 6, Tamil Nadu: 2)
Frontend: 'By Category' tab groups colleges by category (Management: 3, Engineering: 4, Medicine: 1)
Frontend: 'By Course' tab groups colleges by course type (MBA, BBA, B.Tech, etc.)
Frontend: Stats cards show Total Colleges (8), Total Courses (24), Closing Soon, Closed
Frontend: College cards show 'Manage Courses' button
Frontend: College cards show seat status summary badges (Available, Closing)
Frontend: 'Manage Courses' dialog opens with college info and courses table
Frontend: Seat status dropdown shows all 4 options (Available, Closing, Under Waiting, Closed)
Frontend: Seat status dropdown is color-coded (green, yellow, blue, red)
Frontend: Seat status update shows success toast notification
Frontend: Status Legend shows all 4 status badges in dialog
Frontend: Counselor view - College detail Fees tab shows seat status badges
Frontend: Counselor view - Seat status badges are color-coded correctly
seed_data_creation: Database already seeded with 8 colleges, 24+ courses. Courses have variety of seat statuses (Available, Closing, Under Waiting, Closed).
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new College Management features tested and working: 1) Admin College Management page at /admin/colleges with search bar, 4 filters (State/City/Category/Course), 4 tabs (All/By Location/By Category/By Course), 2) 'Manage Courses' dialog with seat status dropdown for each course, 3) Seat status has 4 options (Available=green, Closing=yellow, Under Waiting=blue, Closed=red), 4) Counselor view shows seat status badges on college detail Fees tab. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_seat_status_features.py with 25 comprehensive tests.
